exceptions.exn: The LHS of scal_zero_r (scal _ zero) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment K : Ring V : ModuleSpace K H : forall x : K, scal x zero = zero u : V Unable to unify "let (sort, _, _) := ?G in sort" with "scal zero u = zero".

original: intros u. rewrite scal_zero_r. apply zero.
